commit.message:
Updates in login page + update on Rest client Spring architecture

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/syncope/trunk@1246240 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

files.patch:
@@ -29,5 +29,14 @@
 
     <bean id="restClient" class="org.syncope.console.rest.RestClient">
         <property name="restTemplate" ref="restTemplate"/>
+        <property name="baseURL" value="http://192.168.0.137:8080/syncope/"/>
+    </bean>
+
+    <bean id="schemaRestClient" class="org.syncope.console.rest.SchemaRestClient">
+        <property name="restClient" ref="restClient"/>
+    </bean>
+
+    <bean id="usersRestClient" class="org.syncope.console.rest.UsersRestClient">
+        <property name="restClient" ref="restClient"/>
     </bean>
 </beans>
\ No newline at end of file
